required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Nusinersen on Adults With Spinal Muscular Atrophy
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Nusinersen on Motor Function in Adult Patients With Spinal Muscular Atrophy Types 2 and 3

brief_summary.textblock: Observational study of adult patients with spinal muscular atrophy types 2 and 3 receiving nusinersen

detailed_description.textblock: Observational study to assess effects of nusinersen on motor function in adult patients with spinal muscular atrophy who are both ambulatory and non-ambulatory. Subjects will receive standard of care with nusinersen intrathecal injection and undergo baseline and every 6 month motor assessments and pulmonary function testing during the first two years of treatment with nusinersen.

primary_outcome.description: Primary Endpoint: Change from baseline to end of study in quantitative motor strength by dynamometry of upper limb muscles - shoulder abduction and elbow flexion/extension.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in upper limb motor function
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to end of study in upper limb module score

primary_outcome.measure: Change in 6 minute walk test in ambulatory patients
primary_outcome.description: Change in 6 minute walk test from baseline to end of study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in pulmonary function by spirometry forced vital capacity (FVC)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in FVC from baseline to end of study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in 10 meter walk test in ambulatory patients
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to end of study in the 10 meter walk test

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in compound muscle action potential (CMAP) amplitude by nerve conduction velocity (NCV) criteria
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to end of study in CMAP amplitude of responses from median, ulnar and peroneal motor nerves

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in pulmonary function by spirometry forced expiratory volume (FEV)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to end of study in FEV

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subjects with spinal muscular atrophy types 2 and 3
arm_group.description: Intrathecal nusinersen will be administered to all subjects per FDA approved label.

intervention.description: Subjects will receive nusinersen and be observed with motor assessments for 24 months
intervention.arm_group_label: Subjects with spinal muscular atrophy types 2 and 3

study_pop.textblock: The population to be studied are a homogenous group of adult subjects with 5q SMA seeking treatment with nusinersen. The subjects will have a broad phenotype spectrum of motor weakness including ability to ambulate, non-ambulatory and varying degrees of upper limb motor function and respiratory and swallow abilities, with some more affected and requiring invasive ventilation or NIV, and/or PEG tubes for nutrition.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Genetically confirmed 5q SMA
- ability to access intrathecal space for nusinersen injection
Exclusion Criteria:
- Renal impairment
- thrombocytopenia
- inability to access intrathecal space by CT or flouro guided injection

results_reference.citation: Finkel RS, Mercuri E, Darras BT, Connolly AM, Kuntz NL, Kirschner J, Chiriboga CA, Saito K, Servais L, Tizzano E, Topaloglu H, Tulinius M, Montes J, Glanzman AM, Bishop K, Zhong ZJ, Gheuens S, Bennett CF, Schneider E, Farwell W, De Vivo DC; ENDEAR Study Group. Nusinersen versus Sham Control in Infantile-Onset Spinal Muscular Atrophy. N Engl J Med. 2017 Nov 2;377(18):1723-1732. doi: 10.1056/NEJMoa1702752.

Mercuri E, Darras BT, Chiriboga CA, Day JW, Campbell C, Connolly AM, Iannaccone ST, Kirschner J, Kuntz NL, Saito K, Shieh PB, Tulinius M, Mazzone ES, Montes J, Bishop KM, Yang Q, Foster R, Gheuens S, Bennett CF, Farwell W, Schneider E, De Vivo DC, Finkel RS; CHERISH Study Group. Nusinersen versus Sham Control in Later-Onset Spinal Muscular Atrophy. N Engl J Med. 2018 Feb 15;378(7):625-635. doi: 10.1056/NEJMoa1710504.
